snippet: Now that the East Village is filled with artisanal restaurants and upscale boutiques, HiFi is no longer just another dive but a tether to this neighborhood’s faded bohemia.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Hifi Bar, one of last East Village dive bars catering to indie rock crowd.
lead_paragraph: Now that the East Village is filled with artisanal restaurants and upscale boutiques, HiFi is no longer just another dive but a tether to this neighborhood’s faded bohemia.

headline.main: The HiFi Bar in the East Village Has Rock Credentials
